snippet.title: [Horror Game] The Kindeman Remedy - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
A brand new sim/management horror game from the publisher of Ravenous Devils!

The most blasphemous, diabolical and morally unacceptable management game ever. Aided by a lascivious nun in a hellish prison, rig executions, conduct horrid experiments and do unspeakable things to create The Kindeman Remedy. 

Don't fear: this time, you're the monster!

Coming Fall 2023 - Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/TKRSTEAMYT
